definition: editor or creator of online content (diminutive term, often used to refer to oneself: I, me, this writer)
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: So let's see how to make the trifle.
sentences.chinese: 下面小編就爲大家介紹一下乳脂鬆糕的做法。

sentences.english: Today, I will take you to read the poetic life of Li Po.
sentences.chinese: 今天，小編將同大家一起賞讀李太白的詩酒人生。

definition: to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
